name: ProtectWise
description: This app integrates with the ProtectWise cloud platform to implement ingestion and investigative actions

first_run_max_events.description: Maximum events to poll first time

poll_hours.description: Ingest events in last N hours (Poll Now and First Run)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
actions.verbose: This action uses the unique access ID and access key to send a request to the Sumo Logic API to retrieve a single collector.

actions.description: Download pcap for an event or observation
actions.verbose:
A few things to note:
  • Valid values for the type parameter are:
    • Event
    • Observation
  • The app adds the Event ID to every container as it's Source ID(source_data_identifier)
    Unfortunately this value can get clipped in the UI. Instead use the download button to download the container json and extract the source_data_identifier key value
  • The app adds the Observation ID to every Artifact in a key named observationId of the cef dictionary
  • The sensor_id parameter is only required if the type is Observation
  • The pcap file is added to the vault with a file name of <id>.pcap

actions.description: Hunt an IP in the network
actions.verbose:
To get info within a time range specify the start_time and end_time. These parameters take the time in the Zulu format which can be expressed as %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ for e.g. 2016-12-30T13:00:00.0000Z.
  • If start_time and end_time both are not specified, then the app defaults to last 5 days
  • If start_time is specified and end_time is not, then the app will default the end_time to current
  • If end_time is not specified and start_time is, the app will throw an error

actions.description: Hunt a domain in the network
actions.verbose:
To get info within a time range specify the start_time and end_time. These parameters take the time in the Zulu format which can be expressed as %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ for e.g. 2016-12-30T13:00:00.0000Z.
  • If start_time and end_time both are not specified, then the app defaults to last 5 days
  • If start_time is specified and end_time is not, then the app will default the end_time to current
  • If end_time is not specified and start_time is, the app will throw an error

actions.description: Hunt for a file in the network
actions.verbose:
To get info within a time range specify the start_time and end_time. These parameters take the time in the Zulu format which can be expressed as %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ for e.g. 2016-12-30T13:00:00.0000Z.
  • If start_time and end_time both are not specified, then the app defaults to last 5 days
  • If start_time is specified and end_time is not, then the app will default the end_time to current
  • If end_time is not specified and start_time is, the app will throw an error

actions.description: Query ProtectWise for Events and Observables and ingest into Phantom

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to.

start_time.description: Start of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
start_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is past 10 days

end_time.description: End of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
end_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is now

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for.

artifact_count.description: Maximum number of artifact records to query for.
